  • Uses of Answer in it.polimi.ingsw.server

    Methods in it.polimi.ingsw.server with parameters of type Answer 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void Server.broadcast​(Answer answer)
    Transmits a global message to all active clients connected to the server, iterating inside the virtual client hashmap.
    void VirtualClient.send​(Answer serverAnswer)
    Prepares the answer for sending it through the network, putting it in a serialized package, called SerializedMessage, then sends the packaged answer to the transmission protocol, located in the socket-client handler.
    void GameHandler.sendAll​(Answer message)
    Same as the previous method, but it iterates on all the clients present in the game.
    void VirtualClient.sendAll​(Answer serverAnswer)
    Send the message to all playing clients, thanks to the GameHandler sendAll method.
    void GameHandler.sendAllExcept​(Answer message, int excludedID)
    Same as the previous method, but it iterates on all the clients present in the game, except the declared one.
    void GameHandler.singleSend​(Answer message, int id)
    Send to a client, identified by his ID number, a determined message through the server socket.
    void VirtualClient.win​(Answer win)
